newsitem.title: CHINA: China Stone Group 9-mth profit up 44.6 pct--paper.
newsitem.headline: China Stone Group 9-mth profit up 44.6 pct--paper.

text.p: Stone Group, the Chinese high-technology company, has recorded a 44.6 percent year-on-year rise in profits for the first nine months of 1996, the Beijing Economic Daily said on Thursday.
Rising profits showed a the group's revival was under way after a period of adjustment, the newspaper said without giving details. It did not say whether the increase was before or after tax either.
The Stone Group includes Hong Kong-listed Stone Electronic Technology Ltd.
In recent years the group had invested 40 million yuan ($4.8 million) to set up a sales network across China that had 31 subsidaries and 3,000 agents, the newspaper said.

The Stone Group started in 1984 as a tiny collectively owned firm built on loans worth $2,400. It has since grown to become the largest private high-technology company in China, with assets worth more than $72 million, according to company officials.
